meanings.definition: The process of adjusting the space between characters in a piece of text.
meanings.sent1: Graphic designers pay attention to kernings to make text look neat and professional.
meanings.sent2: The kernings in this font make it easy to read even from a distance.
meanings.sent3: When the kernings went haywire, the text looked like a jumbled mess!
meanings.sent4: The kernings between them were so perfect, it felt like the letters were dancing together.
meanings.sent5: She meticulously adjusted the kernings until each letter fit snugly next to its neighbor.

meanings.definition: The amount of space between characters in a font.
meanings.sent1: The kernings in this font are too tight, making it hard to read.
meanings.sent2: Designers often overlook the importance of proper kernings in fonts.
meanings.sent3: The kernings in the font were so wide, it felt like the letters were social distancing!
meanings.sent4: The kernings in the font whispered a story of elegance and sophistication.
meanings.sent5: The unique kernings of this font set it apart from the rest, giving it a distinct personality.
